website_summaries.verdict: A revamped version of the classic, the Puma Suede Classic Badge Iced exhibits a more stylish design without straying too far away from its streamlined aesthetic. It features a tonal hue with its outsole receiving the "iced" treatment offering a stylishly unique pair.Apart from its updated design, the shoe stays true to its heritage by utilizing the same materials as its predecessors. This means that it provides the time-tested and familiar comfort and fit that most have come to love throughout the years.
pros: Most of the reviewers agree that the Puma Suede Classic Badge Iced is very comfortable
The shoe feels very durable, according to a number of
One shoe user liked the fact that it is easy to clean
The Puma Suede Classic Badge Iced has a rich background that a few of its long-time fans appreciate
Majority of the consumers find this kick to be stylish
The iced outsole is a unique design feature
A significant number of wearers said that this sneaker runs true to size
Several buyers mentioned that it is excellent value for money
cons: A few reviewers disclosed that the shoe is not that breathable

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit and seem to be made just slightly looser or fatter than my last pumas but a good fit. The dark grey color looks pretty nice. The embroidered logo on the side is thick. Shipping to CA on these took about 3 days with Prime for me instead of the usual 2. UPDATE: Less than 2 weeks after delivery I noticed a tear on the side where the embroidered logo is. I never abused these or did not wear these everyday. Returning. It's a shame because these look good. Update to 2 stars for the tear otherwise I'd give them a 4-5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AmmozonTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Mine were straight from Amazon and I am satisfied. However
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected from the shoe. They are true to size and comfy. Mine are legit Puma. Sometimes if you're lucky you can snatch them at a low price if that is your size and they are legit. Mine were straight from Amazon and I am satisfied. However, the TWILIGHT BLUE color in real life is not that dark navy blue shade like in the photo. It is more of a royal blue shade. I didn't want to rate it less than 5 stars because that is no fault of the shoe, just that they must have used flash when they took the pic. Otherwise, the shoes are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Stance Is Everything

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these purple kicks
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these purple kicks! Being an avid LSU fan, I just with they had some gold on them somehow, but I'll fix that with some gold laces. These fit great -- great arch support for my very high arches, and easy to wear all day with no discomfort. Being a size 14, I was pleased to find some fashionable shoes that were affordable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the shoes, but the swoosh on the side is made of strings that quickly start to shred up and stick out. I am by no means rough with these shoes. I have actually been careful since they are nice blue suede. It still started to unravel on two of four sides. I am not even sure the process of unraveling didn't start before I got them. I haven't had them for long and have worn them sparingly. They also fit slightly smaller than other brand 12s, which is a pain because the next size is always 13 and that's too big. Overall disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Impressive color and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these shoes for quite a while. I wore them the moment I got them. The color is bright and cheery. I got an 8.5 and worried it would be very obvious that it was too big. They are still quite comfortable. They are flattering on because of the design. Some sneakers make my feet look huge, these do not. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Rae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Suede shoes at a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these PUMA blue suede shoes several times since they fit perfectly and clean up easily. I walk and stand in them all day at work in a hospital lab. They also hold up in rain and snow after a coat of Scotchguard. Will buy again for sure. Great value! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBizShopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made magenta puma sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are sweet! I luv how they look, how the puma sign is carefully stitched I'm and not pasted on and not too mention the color. It pops! Need to do then I'm hot pink!!😄 I gave them 4 starts because the dye colored my white laces that I decided to switch to bring out the white in the sneakers 😞 In spite of that I'd still recommend these sneakers to anyone who's down for well made magenta sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha R. Lumar

customer_reviews.title: I love the Puma Men's Suede Classic Badge Iced Fashion sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I love the Puma Men's Suede Classic Badge Iced Fashion sneaker. The size 12 fit perfect. Shoe sizes can vary by brand in other styles I am 11 or 11.5 in other styles.The comfort of the round toe and suede is rare to come by in $50 shoes. Hard to find affordable hip red sneakers for matching redheads. I did notice long jeans can transfer color on the heals so I wear skinny pants that rise above the heels or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stiff suede
customer_reviews.text: Size 5 toe box is bit narrow. Size 5.5 may fit me better. The material is much stiffer than the Puma suede Classic from Zappos. I want to return them, but there is a return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: comfy

customer_reviews.title: About 2 months ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe so my son can alternate with other pairs of shoes. after 2 months of wearing it only 3 times, the suede on the sides is lifting up. The shoe is no good. It is dry rotted. IThe looks very nice but do not waste your money buying because it is money down the drain. I did reach out to the customer service team and all they will tell you is that 30 days return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on a budget

customer_reviews.title: Elvis, I now own a pair of blue suede shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I always had good memories of this maker. I saw a photograph of one of my favorite singers wearing a pair. Blue is my fave colour. Cannot wait for the snow to melt, so I can wear these kicks. They're so cool. Love em'
customer_reviews.author: LEE R.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look great but feel really narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great but feel really narrow. I like the way they look, but after a few hours of wearing them I have to get them off my feet because they are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: O. Long

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful sneakers in real life
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful sneakers in real life, but they are really narrow and have very little insoles. Not good for people with wide feet. I guess they would be good for occasional wear, but not long term all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great PUMA quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking shoe!!! Great quality design and stitching and very comfortable as always with PUMA. I recommend going 1 size bigger when you order. Normally I wear a size 11 with other brands but with PUMA I wear size 12. I'm flat footed and there is not much arch support but I have special orthopedic insoles and the shoes are very comfortable as a result. Recommend buying overall!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Sides fray
customer_reviews.text: The Puma logo that runs down the sides is threaded and will fray if worn as sneakers. They are better for casual wear that does not get a lot of use. Bought them for my 12 year old son and they looked like they were 6 months old after the first 6 days. Durability is not strong with this style
customer_reviews.author: robert akens

customer_reviews.title: Either fakes or simply not being made as well as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea whether these are counterfeit or not, but I can say that this is the third pair of PUMA suedes I've owned and the first to start falling apart in less than four months. The inside heel has completely worn through to the plastic on both shoes, now, and in the past these shoes have lasted me years. I am an office worker -- these do not get heavy wear. Extremely upset.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrusnyc

customer_reviews.title: NICE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: OLD SCHOOL AND SUPER COOL! FITS AS EXPECTED AND COMFORTABLE. THE LAPIS BLUE SHOE TURNS HEADS AND BRINGS COMPLEMENTS GALORE! GET EM AND BE COOL IN YOUR JEANS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as heck ok
customer_reviews.text: This shoes so dope! Comfortable as heck ok! The smooth suede iz so crazy! The ice blu pair! Omg! Im about 2 get me 3 mo pair in different colors! Aight ? Aight! 100% dope and thats official son ya heard me!
customer_reviews.author: divine

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and fits just right
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved these shoes for his first day at school. They are stylish and have a great colo.. They also fit just right. I only gave it 4 stars because it is suede. I'm sure these will be ruined once they get very far.

customer_reviews.title: LOYAL PUMA CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, who is a "Puma Only" sneaker wearer. He was pleased with the color and the style. I watch for Puma sales and have purchased at least 12 pairs (all different colors) for him. He had never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shuggar

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and the fun colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the fun colors. Great for wearing to the office or around the house. Not so great for a walking shoe as they don't have much cushion. Don't have wide sizes so I ordered 1/2 size up.

customer_reviews.title: Grips well and has awesome color.
customer_reviews.text: Thick red suede shoes with the iconic puma lines embroidered on the side. I like that the sole of the shoe matches the color and laces of the shoe. Very comfortable and the sole is very grippy.

customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit. Shoe is a bit wide but comfortable

customer_reviews.text: These are irregulars. It doesn't say that in the description, but the stitches are not straight and the rubber is separating from the top on the first wear. I don't recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Go up one size
customer_reviews.text: I love Pumas. I’ve made the switch from adidas to pumas a while back and haven’t regretted it once. One thing I’ve done though is go up a shoe size from what I normally wear.

customer_reviews.text: Generally, I like the shoe. My problem is medical because I need to wear an ortho insole in all my shoes now because of plantar fascia...is why I said "I like". In fact, I am wearing them for the 1st time today of this review.

product_meta.title: PUMA Mens Suede Classic Badge Iced-M Suede Classic Badge Iced
product_meta.description: Definitely the most well-known and popular of all PUMA shoes, this sport classic is one of the shoe that built the succes of the german sports brand. As part of every street community from the 80's on, the suede has even been involved in historical matters on a global scale. This suede classic badge pack is a new upper offering that includes an embossed formstripe that changes up the look of the traditional suede.
